gobblin.runtime.scheduler

Class AbstractJobSpecScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.scheduler.AbstractJobSpecScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, JobSpecScheduler, JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImmediateJobSpecScheduler, QuartzJobSpecScheduler

    public abstract class AbstractJobSpecScheduler
extends AbstractIdleService
implements JobSpecScheduler
    A base implementation of JobSpecScheduler that keeps track of JobSpecSchedules and listeners. Subclasses are expected to implement mainly doScheduleJob(JobSpec, Runnable) and doUnschedule(JobSpecSchedule) which implement the actual scheduling.

      • registerJobSpecSchedulerListener

        public void registerJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener listener)
        Specified by:
        registerJobSpecSchedulerListener in interface JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer

      • registerWeakJobSpecSchedulerListener

        public void registerWeakJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener listener)
        Like JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer.registerJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener) but it will create a weak reference. The implementation will automatically remove the listener registration once the listener object gets GCed.

        Note that weak listeners cannot be removed used JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer.unregisterJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener).

        Specified by:
        registerWeakJobSpecSchedulerListener in interface JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer

      • unregisterJobSpecSchedulerListener

        public void unregisterJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener listener)
        Specified by:
        unregisterJobSpecSchedulerListener in interface JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer

      • scheduleJob

        public JobSpecSchedule scheduleJob(JobSpec jobSpec,
                                   Runnable jobRunnable)
        Add a Gobblin job for scheduling. If the job is configured appropriately (scheduler-dependent), it will be executed repeatedly.
        Specified by:
        scheduleJob in interface JobSpecScheduler
        Parameters:
        jobSpec - the JobSpec of the job
        jobRunnable - a runnable that will execute the job

      • scheduleOnce

        public JobSpecSchedule scheduleOnce(JobSpec jobSpec,
                                    Runnable jobRunnable)
        Add a Gobblin job for scheduling. Job is guaranteed to run only once regardless of job outcome.
        Specified by:
        scheduleOnce in interface JobSpecScheduler
        Parameters:
        jobSpec - the JobSpec of the job
        jobRunnable - a runnable that will execute the job

      • unscheduleJob

        public void unscheduleJob(URI jobSpecURI)
        Remove a job from scheduling. This will not affect any executions that are currently running.
        Specified by:
        unscheduleJob in interface JobSpecScheduler
        Parameters:
        jobSpecURI - the URI of the Gobblin job to unschedule.

      • getSchedules

        public Map<URI,JobSpecSchedule> getSchedules()
        The outstanding job schedules. This is represents a snapshot in time and will not be updated as new schedules are added/removed.
        Specified by:
        getSchedules in interface JobSpecScheduler
        Returns:
        a map with the URIs of the scheduled jobs for keys and the schedules for values
